criteria: >80% unit test coverage on new logic; All ACLs and record rules implemented; Zero critical/high SonarQube issues; Manual RBAC verification passed.
success_metrics: All master data CRUD functional; RBAC working as designed.

criteria: End-to-end trip lifecycle from 'Planned' to 'Delivered' is functional; Driver Portal MVP is responsive on 360px viewport; All E2E tests passing.
success_metrics: Successful demo of the full trip lifecycle.

criteria: E-invoicing integration with GSP sandbox is fully functional, including failure/retry logic; Generated PDF invoice is compliant with GST norms.
success_metrics: 100% success rate for e-invoice generation against sandbox.

criteria: Dashboard LCP < 3s; GPS map latency < 60s; All report calculations verified for accuracy against a controlled dataset.
success_metrics: All NFRs for performance and latency are met.

criteria: Final data migration dry-run completed with zero critical discrepancies; Validation report is signed off by business stakeholders; Go-live runbook is complete and peer-reviewed.
